title: The Problems with Church Incorporation - Phillip G. Kayser
description:
Too often church leaders fall prey to the habits and expectations of those around them. Whether it be peers, lawyers, or ill-informed lay people, bowing to the pressure to incorporate the church leads the body of Christ into ill-advised alliances. In Acts 18 Paul shows the dangers of such folly and thus we have been given ample warning to walk a different path than the synagogues of his time.


About the author:
Phillip Kayser is the Senior Pastor of Dominion Covenant Church in Omaha, NE. He holds a M.Div. from Westminst er Theological Seminary (California) and a Ph.D. from Whitefield Theological Seminary (Florida). He and his wife Kathy have 5 children
